author: tkormann
msg: - add a new global listener for DOMCharacterDataModified event
- add a new method handleDOMCharacterDataModified on
BridgeUpdateHandler that is automatically called on the enclosing SVG

author: tkormann
msg: - bug fix, relatedNode now contains the correct info when needed
next step, implementation of DOMFocusIn/Out and DOMActive events

author: tkormann
msg: mouse events now work on tspan.
if you click on a tspan, the target of the event is the tspan and the
mouse events are propagated in the DOM, from the tspan.

author: hillion
msg: - batik/xml/ parsing classes now work like the other Batik parsing classes,
- changed content type for the native script jars.

author: tkormann
msg: quick fix to remove an old bug (trying to pan, zoom...) with no document currently display (basically, when the browser start).
